movies.title: Autumn Blood
movies.plot: High in the Mountains on a secluded farm a widowed mother dies leaving her two children alone and orphaned. Fearing being taken away and split up they keep their mother's death a secret and survive off the land with no one to rely on but each other. The sixteen year old sister is one with nature, innocent, and unaware of the evils that exist in mankind. Her ten year old brother is traumatized and mute from witnessing a disturbing incident years earlier (the death of his father) involving the town's Mayor. As the girl transitions into womanhood a harsh brutality destroys her innocence when savage hunters led by the Mayor's son attack and rape her. A social worker from a distant city arrives to investigate but ultimately it is the siblings who must come of age to protect each other and survive.
movies.simplePlot: High in the Mountains, a widowed mother dies, leaving her two children orphaned. Fearing being split up they keep their mother's death a secret. They survive until villagers destroy their innocence when they brutally assault the girl. Now the siblings must come of age to protect each other and survive.

biography.bio: Sophie is the daughter of Ian and Anne Lowe and younger sister of brother Sam. Sophie moved, with her family, to Australia, at age 10, and first developed an interest in acting, after appearing in a grade school musical production at age 16. Moreover, Lowe did some modeling in her early teens (she was signed to Chadwick Models), but eventually stopped modeling to concentrate on dancing, instead. It was her dancing which led to Sophie attending the McDonald School of Performing Arts in Sydney, Australia, where she decided to more seriously pursue acting. She did several short films and TV ads, prior to graduating from college in 2008. Lowe made her feature length film debut as the titular main character in Beautiful Kate (2009); her performance was praised by critics and she was subsequently nominated for an AFI Award for Best Lead Actress. Besides acting, Sophie also writes songs and poetry.
biography.name: Sophie Lowe

biography.bio: Maximilian Harnisch is an actor, known for Autumn Blood (2013), L'homme en noir (2009) and Willkommen Österreich (2007).
biography.name: Maximilian Harnisch

biography.bio: Peter Stormare was born in Arbrå, Gävleborgs län, Sweden, to Gunhild (Holm) and Karl Ingvar Storm. He began his acting career at the Royal National Theatre of Sweden, performing for eleven years. In 1990 he became the Associate Artistic Director at the Tokyo Globe Theatre and directed productions of many Shakespeare plays, including "Hamlet". In 1993 he moved to New York, where he appeared in English productions. He continues to work in both the United States and his his homeland of Sweden. He resides in Los Angeles, California, USA, with his wife.
biography.name: Peter Stormare

biography.bio: Samuel Vauramo was born on October 22, 1981 in Vantaa, Finland. He is an actor, known for The American (2010), Beauty and the Bastard (2005) and Tears of April (2008).
biography.name: Samuel Vauramo

biography.bio: Gustaf Skarsgård was born on November 12, 1980 in Stockholm, Stockholms län, Sweden as Gustaf Caspar Orm Skarsgård. He is an actor and director, known for Vikings (2013), The Way Back (2010) and Evil (2003).
biography.name: Gustaf Skarsgård

biography.bio: Tim Morten Uhlenbrock was born in 1985 in Königs Wusterhausen, Brandenburg, Germany. He is an actor and producer, known for Bridge of Spies (2015), Autumn Blood (2013) and Kombat Sechzehn (2005).
biography.name: Tim Morten Uhlenbrock

biography.bio: Annica McCrudden is known for her work on Autumn Blood (2013), A Midsummer Comedy (2009) and Moment in Time (2001). She has been married to Ian McCrudden since October 26, 2002. They have two children.
biography.name: Annica McCrudden

biography.bio: George Lenz was born on April 6, 1967 in Kronberg, Germany. He is an actor and producer, known for Autumn Blood (2013), Wedding Daydream (2004) and Au septième ciel (2000).
biography.name: George Lenz

biography.bio: Nelly Gschwandtner is known for her work on Autumn Blood (2013).
biography.name: Nelly Gschwandtner

biography.bio: Julia Dietze was born on January 9, 1981 in Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône, France. She is an actress, known for 1½ Knights - In Search of the Ravishing Princess Herzelinde (2008), Iron Sky (2012) and Iron Sky: The Coming Race (2018).
biography.name: Julia Dietze

biography.bio: Hansa Czypionka was born on March 1, 1958 in Sandhorst, Aurich, Lower Saxony, Germany. He is an actor, known for Beyond Silence (1996), Happy Birthday, Türke! (1992) and R.I.S. - Die Sprache der Toten (2007).
biography.name: Hansa Czypionka

biography.bio: Jonas Laux was born in 1982 in Karl-Marx-Stadt [now Chemnitz], Germany. He is an actor, known for SOKO Wismar (2004), Autumn Blood (2013) and L'homme en noir (2009).
biography.name: Jonas Laux

biography.bio: Jacqueline Le Saunier was born on August 21, 1983 in Vienna, Austria. She is an actress, known for Autumn Blood (2013), Ellas Entscheidung (2015) and House of the Sleeping Beauties (2006).
biography.name: Jacqueline Le Saunier

biography.bio: Hannah Payr is an actress, known for Autumn Blood (2013).
biography.name: Hannah Payr

biography.bio: Elias Doblander is an actor, known for Autumn Blood (2013).
biography.name: Elias Doblander

awards.award: Molins de Rei Horror Film Festival 2014
